li.a: Child Abuse & Neglect and Procedures Policy
Supt.'s Good News Report for BOE

p.span: The mission of the Southern Door County School District is to ensure that all children learn. Through our work as a collaborative community, our students will develop the knowledge, skills, and confidence to achieve at a high level. We do this so our students can meet future challenges and be contributing members of our global society.
